Name: AWS - Deregister ELB Instance
Description: Removes the current instance from the ELB

Parameters.Name: ec2ClientId
Parameters.Label: AWS EC2 Client Id
Parameters.HelpText: The client id used to authenticate with AWS

Parameters.Name: ec2Credentials
Parameters.Label: AWS EC2 Client Secret
Parameters.HelpText: The client secret used to authenticate with AWS

Parameters.Name: elbName
Parameters.Label: AWS ELB Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the AWS ELB to remove the instance from

Parameters.Name: ec2Region
Parameters.Label: AWS EC2 Region
Parameters.HelpText: The region in which the ELB lives
